Class Jzy3dSpintronic3DViewer

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.apps.physics.spintronics.viewer.Jzy3dSpintronic3DViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Spintronic3DViewer
public class Jzy3dSpintronic3DViewer extends Object implements Spintronic3DViewer
Jzy3d (OpenGL) implementation of Spintronic3DViewer. Provides high-performance 3D rendering for large spin arrays.

      Description copied from interface: Spintronic3DViewer
      Adds a ferromagnetic layer to the scene.
      Specified by:
      addLayer in interface Spintronic3DViewer
      Parameters:
      y - Y position (vertical stack)
      thickness - Layer thickness (for display scaling)
      color - Color hex string (e.g., "#34495e")
      label - Layer name
